item.title: Volkan add a quote by Evelyn Beatrice Hall
item.description: "I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it." -- Evelyn Beatrice Hall

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Anthony Burgess
item.description: "Is it better for a man to have chosen evil than to have good imposed upon him?" -- Anthony Burgess

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Volkan add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Mustafa Kemal Ataturk
item.description: "We do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration, not from heaven, or the unseen world, but directly from life." -- Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I would believe only in a God that knows how to dance." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: "Only in the darkness can you see the stars." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Volkan add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "We are going to die, and that makes us the lucky ones. Most people are never going to die because they are never going to be born. The potential people who could have been here in my place but who will in fact never see the light of day outnumber the sand grains of Arabia. Certainly those unborn ghosts include greater poets than Keats, scientists greater than Newton. We know this because the set of possible people allowed by our DNA so massively exceeds the set of actual people. In the teeth of these stupefying odds it is you and I, in our ordinariness, that are here.We privileged few, who won the lottery of birth against all odds, how dare we whine at our inevitable return to that prior state from which the vast majority have never stirred?" -- Richard Dawkins
